title: Pixel restarting continuously
content:
Suddenly my phone is restarting on its own. It sometimes bootloops, or sometimes it starts fully and then restarts, within a minute or so. There's no patttern of it. 
I have tried starting it in safe mode, it didn't work. I have done factory reset, but the issue still persists.
The phone is purchased in the US and I am currently in Pune, India. 

Please assist.
